JobTitle: Aircraft Maintenance Support Engineer - Scheduler - OCONUS
JobFullDesc: Description:This position requires OCONUS deployment. Plans and schedules aerospace vehicle maintenance and utilization requirements. Develops plans and establishes production schedules to meet mission requirements. Schedules aerospace vehicles, space systems, AGE, munitions/armaments, and engines. Determines maintenance capabilities and aid in developing operational schedules. Prepares daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, and annual utilization schedules for known maintenance and operational mission and training requirements. Coordinates with base activities to ensure support is available to meet schedules. Manages aerospace vehicles, engines, armament/munitions, space systems, AGE, and selected equipment inventory data. Monitors scheduling effectiveness. Schedules and monitors workload requirements. Ensures appropriate leadership levels are advised of maintenance capabilities, limiting production factors, and adherence to maintenance schedules. Uses automated system to schedule and monitor maintenance activities’ workload. Administers work control by authorizing jobs, work priorities, and completion times. Operates automated information systems and maintains equipment records to support applicable weapon systems.  Reviews, evaluates, and files documented information for planning and scheduling maintenance actions. Maintains historical and flight status records of weapons and support systems. Manages the aircraft configuration, Time Compliance Technical Orders (TCTO), Special Inspections (SI), and time change items (TCI) and their related automated subsystems. Ensures accurate documentation of aircraft configuration, TCTOs, TCIs, and SIs.#OCONUSBasic Qualifications:Ability to obtain a Secret security clearance. At least five years of Maintenance Management (Plans, Scheduling and Documentation) experience. Must have a valid US Passport. Must successfully complete CONUS Replacement Center (CRC).Desired Skills:Desire at least 1 year Maintenance Scheduling experience on MQ-1 and/or MQ-9 aircraft.BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:job.QualificationsLockheed Martin is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.
